item.title: My Favourite List of Softwares
item.description: image manipulation | Screenshot ShareX (10/10) Alternatives GreenShot (7/10) flameshot (8/10) Pdf Manipulation Pdf editors drawboard ⭐ okular custom tools ✅ image insert ❌ XODO Custom tool add option ❌ Pdf Tools Online iLovePdf Offline pdfarranger arrange , merge , add , split , remove , etc Bookmarks preserve after merge ❌ SysTools PDF Merge Tool Bookmarks preserve after merge ?
